description: This table stores mammography assessment-related information for an order.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record associated with this procedure order.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: ASSESSMENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mammography assessment category number for the order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Need Additional Imaging Evaluation


Negative


Benign


Probably Benign


Suspicious


Highly Suggestive of Malignancy


Known Biopsy-Proven Malignancy


Low Suspicion for Malignancy


Moderate Suspicion for Malignancy


High Suspicion for Malignancy

columns.name: RIGHT_ASMT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mammography right assessment category number for the order.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ASSESSMENT_C_NAME

columns.name: LEFT_ASMT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mammography left assessment category number for the order.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ASSESSMENT_C_NAME

columns.name: MAM_OV_ASMT_CALC_YN
columns.description:
A Boolean value that indicates whether overall assessment is auto-calculated.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: MAM_LT_ASMT_CALC_YN
columns.description:
A Boolean value that indicates whether left assessment is auto-calculated.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MAM_OV_ASMT_CALC_YN

columns.name: MAM_RT_ASMT_CALC_YN
columns.description:
A Boolean value that indicates whether right assessment is auto-calculated.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MAM_OV_ASMT_CALC_YN
